taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Poa saltuensis Fernald & Wiegand subsp. saltuensis

bio:treatment.description: Lemmas 2.4-4 mm, lanceolate, apices acute to acuminate and pointed, scarious for 0.25-0.5 mm; anthers 0.9-1.5 mm. 2n = 28.
bio:treatment.discussion: Poa saltuensis subsp. saltuensis grows throughout the range of the species, in open forests and woodlands with low to moderate pH soils.
